description:
"Indian Fusion" will take place on:

Thursday, 18 April 2013 
La Maison du Peuple, Parvis de St. Gilles 37

Agenda: 
18:30-19:30 hatha yoga 
20:00: Indian buffet 
21:00: live Indian classical music concert by Prabhu Edouard and Michel Guy

Prices: 
Yoga+buffet+concert: 25 Euros 
Buffet+concert: 20 Euros

For Booking and more Information 
www.jagatkarma.com

Like · Reply · 3 days ago · Mute
name: Indian Fusion

description:
Friends, Fans and Newcomers, Welcome and Namaste!

Taking place on Sunday, 2nd June 2013. Come join us and treat yourself to a yoga brunch and Indian ragas. Take this opportunity to celebrate with us the beginning of the summer on this first Sunday of the month of June!

Highlights of this event are: A Hatha yoga class with meditation / relaxation,vegetarian Indian buffet followed by two live Indian classical concerts.

Timetable: 
11:00-12:15 hatha yoga + relaxation / meditation (doors open at 10:30) 
12:30-13:30 vegetarian brunch buffet (doors open at 12:00) 
13:30 -15:15 concerts by - 
1.(voix du sud) RAPHAËLLE BROCHET (vocal) & CARLO STRAZZANTE (UDU)- South-Indian classical vocal.
2.TANDOORI GROOVE (Tabla Solo) by PRABHU Edouard,Carlo STRAZZANTE(NAGMA GITAR).

FOR MORE INFO WWW.JAGATKARMA.COM or [masked] tel[masked]
name: INDIAN TANDOORI GROOVE

description:
We welcome you to an Indian Raga Morning, Sunday at 11 a.m. Two well-known Indian classical music instrument players Asad.Q (sarod)and Arup Sen Gupta(tabla)will perform on this special day. In association with Jagat Karma, the works of Geraldine Langlois « L’essence du cinéma indien »,(Photography)will be on display during this art exhibition in the Chapelle de Boondael.Door open at 10 am concert start 11:15 chai break 11:45 -12:15 12:15-13:00 concert.
*FREE ENTRANCE* but booking required.via facebook or [masked] or[masked] 282.
name: INDIAN RAGA MORNING

description:
LETS GIVE A HEALTHY START TO A COLD SUNDAY.JOIN US AT MAISON PELGRIMS ON 20 OCTOBER 2013 AT 9:30 SHARP.ONE HOUR LONG YOGA SESSION FOLLOWED BY HEALTHY INDIAN VEGETARIAN BRUNCH(MIXTURE OF NORTH N SOUTH INDIAN DISHES).BRING LIGHT CLOTHS NO JEANS IN YOGA ROOM PLEASE.

PLACE:RUE DE PARME 69 BRUSSELS-1060.EASY ACCESS BY METRO 'PORTE DE HALL' TRAM 'PARVIS'

NOW ADDED:-

11:30 -12:30 concerts by - 
Bert Cornelis (Sitar) :Well Known Belgian sitar player Bert has studied for 20 years with his guru A.Pathak and at the classic music univeristy of Allahbad(India)
Pandit Udhav Apegaonkar Shinde (Pakhawaj) :Pt. Shinde is one of the greatest Pakhawaj players of india.The combination sitar-Pakhawaj is unique and much appreciated,the did many concerts in india together with a lot of success. 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IUYGwOcxULs&feature=related

*Prices:
Yoga EUR 8
Brunch+ concerts: EUR 15
Concerts only: 10 EUR
* Prices include chai
RESERVATION:[masked]

CONTACT:[masked]

WWW.JAGATKARMA.COM 

OR FACEBOOK

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Jagat-Karma-asbl/335668033217702
how_to_find_us: Metro port de Hall OR MUNT HOUSE,Tram Parvis .
name: YOGA AND INDIAN MORNING

description:
In this workshop you are invited :

-Listen to your body and reinvest.


-To offer yourself time in the service of your inner life.


-To reconnect to yourself and your deep aspirations.


-Explore an area of freedom with new perspectives.


-Engage your inner resources and make the desired changes.

Bilingual Workshop: French and English.

Brunch Table Indian host after the workshop.


Discovery offer :15 euro workshop+lunch(usual price 30euro+lunch)


A qui s’adresse notre atelier ?

-Avez-vous l’impression que votre vie file à toute allure ?


-Dites-vous souvent je n’ai pas le temps ?


-Reportez-vous régulièrement ce que vous voulez faire le jour même ?


-Prenez-vous le temps de respirer ?

Dans cet atelier vous êtes invité(e) à:

-Ecouter votre corps et le réinvestir.


-Vous offrir un espace-temps au service de votre vie intérieure.


-Vous (re)connecter à vous-même et à vos aspirations profondes.


-Explorer un espace de liberté avec de nouvelles perspectives.


-Mobiliser vos ressources intérieures et laisser s’opérer les transformations souhaitées.

Atelier bilingue: Français et Anglais.

Brunch-Table d'hôte Indien après l'atelier.


WORKSHOP:11:00

   LUNCH 13:00

Limited places! please book in advance.

[masked]
name: "Mindfulness et Conscience Corporelle" WORKSHOP AND INDIAN LUNCH

description:
The Bollywood Brassband are a hot mixture of brass, drums and dhol percussion and their repertoire is made up of extracts from Bollywood film scores and bhanga – the popular Indian dance from the Punjab, together with other musical styles from Southern Asia, all arranged by band members. The group was formed in 1992 to perform with the Shyam Brass Band from Jabulpur, one of the most prestigious of the India’s thousands of brass bands. In 2013 they undertook an impressive tour with enrapturing performances at Womad, Sziget and Roskilde, and now it is Brussels’ turn to be wowed by them and transported to their world.

http://www.muziekpublique.be/nouvelles/concerts-8/article/bollywood-brass-band-uk?id_evenement=1473

venue.name: Théâtre Molière
venue.address_1: Galerie de la Porte de Namur, 3 Square du Bastion, Ixelles

name: Bollywood Brass Band, Festival "Let’s Art India"

description:
Welcome and Namaste!

After our last year,s successful event (*Indian Fusion*) of April 18,2013 . We would like to welcome you to.(With the collaboration of Europalia India)  


                                   *INDIAN FUSION II*,

Taking place on SATURDAY, 18 JAN 2014 

 Come join us and treat yourself to a yoga,dinner and Indian ragas. Take this opportunity to celebrate with us the beginning of this year.
Opening of this event will be with A Hatha yoga class with meditation / relaxation,then vegetarian Indian buffet followed by two live Indian classical concerts.

http://img-ak.verticalresponse.com/media/1/8/d/18d18124a0/35aac6eb34/layout.jpg?__nocache__=1

http://img-ak.verticalresponse.com/media/1/8/d/18d18124a0/35aac6eb34/layout.jpg?__nocache__=1

                                  Timetable:

 18:30-19:30 hatha yoga + relaxation / meditation (doors open at 18:00)(bring light cloths no jeans)

19:50-20:45 mild spicy Vegetarian buffet (doors open at 19:30) 
21:00 -21:50 concerts by - 
1. Fabrice de Graef(Bansury/Flute) & CARLO STRAZZANTE 
(Percussions). http:// www.fabricedegraef.com/
22:05-23:00
2. (Tabla Solo) by PRABHU Edouard,
http:// www.prabhuedouard.com/
Where:Hall MAISON DU PEUPLE, Parvis saint Gilles - 37 BRUSSELS-1060
METRO-PORT DE HALL(5min walk) TRAM:PARVIS(2min walk)
Prices*:
Concerts only: 15 EUR
Dinner + concerts: EUR 25(water Included)
Yoga + dinner+ concerts: 30 EUR
Do not hesitate to contact Sunny Harminder for more information.

description:
Dear Spicy friends, Next sunday 09 feb 2014 some of our group members will be participating in a meditation workshop at yoga studio of jagat karma. Why not we join them after there meditation workshop?when they feel good and fresh?and we are hungry?It is small cooking lesson workshop and we can eat there with a beautiful view at parvis.Whole menu is just 12,50 euro(water Chai is also included).What else ): Nespresso?they do have it toooooo.
Venue:Parvis st. Gilles-8 Brussels-1060
Menu:Veg starters +2-3 main dishs+sweets.
name: lets meet up and have INDIAN SPICY LUNCH

description:
"Mindfulness is a love affair with life, with reality and imagination, with the beauty of your own being, with your heart and body and mind, and with the world." Jon Kabat-Zinn, in "Mindfulness for beginners".

Mindfulness is the focusing of awareness on sensations, emotions, thoughts and anything that could appear in your experience. It is cultivated by paying attention in a sustained and particular way: on purpose, in the present moment and non-judgmentally.This workshop is suitable for everybody: beginners or advanced mediators. 

We will provide you with easy to follow exercices and support your practice with consistency and gentleness.

Animated by:

Antonia Bahtchevanova . www.constellacoeur.be  0473/791930 [masked] Donatienne . www.biennaitre.be

 0478/[masked] [masked] in french with english translation if needed.

Location: Studio Jagat Karma , 8 Parvis de Saint Gilles.1060 Bruxelles .

WWW.JAGATKARMA.COM

Price:2 hours session 30 euro 

VEGETARIAN INDIAN LUNCH  IN OPTION( 13 EURO).

FOR LUNCH PLEASE CONFIRM IN ADVANCE(TILL SUNDAY MORNING 09 FEB BY 10:00AM) [masked][masked]
how_to_find_us: BY METRO "PORT DE NAMUR" BY TRAM"PARVIS"
name: Mindfulness Meditation and Body Consciousness

description:
Dear Spicy friends,

                                    Do you love these finely spiced Indian dishes but always wondered how to chose the right spices? Do you want to learn the secrets behind Masala Chai (Indian spice tea), Samosas (the world famous pastries) and fresh and fruity chutneys (a variety of condiments that cannot miss in an Indian meal)? Do you want to roll your own Chapatis and Parathas (Indian flat breads)?.

 After two successful sessions of April and June we are back again with new session September 2014.

Interested ?drop a mail to [masked]

visit www.jagatkarma.com

 or 

post a message on meet up
name: INDIAN COOKING CLASS

description: Hello everyone, It is Thursday, that is, long market day on the Parvis de St Gilles. We will meet up from around seven infront of Patrizia's food stall, our Italian friend who sells home made food and good Italian wine (just infront of Mama Roma). You will find us sitting there!

Do you want to learn the secrets behind Masala Chai (Indian spice tea), Samosas (the world famous pastries) and fresh and fruity chutneys (a variety of condiments that cannot miss in an Indian meal)? Do you want to roll your own Chapatis and Parathas (Indian flat breads)?
